title: 500 attack damage ranged champion, it's fair i promise
body: Now that i have your attention let me paint this picture.  ADC's can no longer critically strike, but in exchange they average between 500-750 Attack Damage, with ability ratios scaled to account for the new numbers (can't have someone firing a line nuke and clearing the whole wave just off that).  They loss none of their attack speed, and their kits still function the same as they currently do.

replies.body: ADCs have always been really fickle. Either they don't do anything or they do too much. Just wait for them to be nerfed right back down to the ground, then buffed to the sky.

> [{quoted}](name=Ghazter,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ngEAf6W5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-29T04:57:51.060+0000)
>
> ADCs have always been really fickle. Either they don't do anything or they do too much. Just wait for them to be nerfed right back down to the ground, then buffed to the sky.

I think it would be interesting to see critical strike items all get a 50% nerf to the amount of critical they give.  {{item:3031}} + {{item:3087}}  only giving 25% crit would be a huge blow to how effective that combo is.  Hell i can almost stand the idea of 4 items giving 50% crit, high chance to do it each attack BUT equal chance you will not get it.
Imagine Jhin, attacking as fast as Vayne.
